amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used by the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection for a contract for consumer awareness and engagement tools and resources communication.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 70 printed in House Report 114-639 to prohibit the CFPB from implementing any contract with a vendor to provide informational messages.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hartzler amendment (A046) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 179 (Roll no. 396).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hartzler amendment (A046) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 179 (Roll no. 396).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A046) offered by Mrs. Hartzler.
